price: Certes, Nous vous avons bien établis sur Terre et Nous vous y avons assigné des moyens de subsistance. (Mais) vous êtes très peu reconnaissants!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَۗ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad makkannākum fī al-arḍi wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha qalīlan mā tashkurūna
